channel.title: Black Mesa lags!! Help!
channel.description:
Specs:
Corsair TX V2 650W AMD Phenom II X6 1055t ASUS M4A89GTD PRO/USB3 Corsair Vengeance DDR3 1600MHz CL9 16GB (4 + 4 + 4 + 4) Crucial m4 SSD 64gb Samsung SpinPoint F3 1TB (Steam is installed here!) Sapphire Radeon HD 6870 1gb GDDR5
It's lags almost all the time when i play (i don't have the highest resolution either) I have updated the graphic card.
I have no idea why it's lagging, if you got a clue, please answer!
Thanks! :slight_smile:

item.title: Black Mesa lags!! Help!

item.description:
Is your pc up to date? Try installing all primary and secondairy updates.
